activities.title: The Unasked Night
activities.desc: Exchange 5 questions you've never asked each other to update your internal maps.

activities.title: Values Alignment
activities.desc: If the world ended tomorrow, which 3 shared values would we carry with us?

activities.title: Childhood Museum
activities.desc: Look at childhood photos and explain what that child was feeling in that moment.

activities.title: The Future Blueprint
activities.desc: Write a shared digital letter to your future selves 5 years from now and lock it.

activities.title: Inner World Spy
activities.desc: Secretly learn the top 3 stressors your partner has this week and surprise them with a solution.

activities.title: Adrenaline Route
activities.desc: Try something neither of you has ever done (climbing, dancing, exotic cuisine).

activities.title: Random Direction Walk
activities.desc: Let the app decide every turn at intersections; get lost and explore together.

activities.title: The 10 TL Challenge
activities.desc: Go to a market and find the object that will make your partner laugh the most within a tiny budget.

activities.title: Mystery Adventure
activities.desc: Follow a coordinate given by the app and photograph the most interesting detail you find there.

activities.title: Blind Drawing
activities.desc: Draw each other's portrait without looking at the paper and without lifting the pen.

activities.title: The 20-Second Hug
activities.desc: Hold each other until both nervous systems regulate and relax (min 20 seconds).

activities.title: 6-Second Kiss Ritual
activities.desc: A conscious connection longer than a peck to signal the brain to lower stress.

activities.title: The Silent Connection
activities.desc: Walk hand-in-hand for 15 mins in total silence, focusing only on ambient sounds and breathing.

activities.title: Sensate Focus
activities.desc: Guided non-genital touch session focusing purely on sensory pleasure without pressure.

activities.title: Aroma Therapy Meditation
activities.desc: Sit eye-to-eye for 10 mins accompanied by a single scent (lavender, sandalwood, etc.).

activities.title: Kintsugi Night
activities.desc: Discuss a past conflict and identify what you learnedâ€”turning the 'crack' into gold.

activities.title: Omotenashi Challenge
activities.desc: Anticipate a need of your partner before they ask and fulfill it today.

activities.title: Wabi-Sabi Walk
activities.desc: Find 'imperfectly beautiful' things in nature and tell your partner your favorite flaw of theirs.

activities.title: The Gratitude Loop
activities.desc: Spend 10 mins saying only sentences that start with 'I am glad you are here because...'.

activities.title: Midnight Picnic
activities.desc: Indoor picnic by candlelight, phones on airplane mode, pure focus on each other.

activities.title: Safe Harbor Talk
activities.desc: Ask: 'What do I fear most when we fight?' Practice active listening to build safety.

activities.title: Music of Our Souls
activities.desc: Play a song that represents a feeling you can't put into words and explain why.

activities.title: Vulnerability Map
activities.desc: Show where you feel stress in your body; have your partner touch that area to soothe you.

activities.title: Repair Attempt Workshop
activities.desc: Pick a small past tension and re-enact it using scientific repair phrases.

activities.title: Mirroring Movement
activities.desc: Follow your partner's movements slowly like a mirror for 5 mins to sync brains.

activities.title: The Breath Connection
activities.desc: Sit back-to-back and try to align your breathing rhythms for 10 mins.

activities.title: Eye Contact Marathon
activities.desc: Silent eye contact for 4 mins to activate emotional synchrony.

activities.title: Hug Until Relaxed
activities.desc: A second variation: Focus purely on the release of physical tension during the embrace.

activities.title: Dream Architecture
activities.desc: Create a shared vision board for the top floor of your 'Relationship House'.

activities.title: Kintsugi Coffee
activities.desc: Share how the relationship has made you a stronger individual over coffee.

activities.title: The Check-in Ritual
activities.desc: Weekly 'Emotional Bank Account' meeting to track positive investments made.

activities.title: New Skill Date
activities.desc: Try learning a new skill together for 30 mins (origami, coding, a game).

activities.title: Scent Memory Walk
activities.desc: Find 3 scents outdoors that remind you of childhood or early dating days.

activities.title: Role Play Adventure
activities.desc: Meet at a cafe pretending to be strangers and 're-meet' for the first time.
